org.liblouis

Interface DisplayTable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DisplayTable.DisplayTableFromTable, DisplayTable.UnicodeBrailleDisplayTable

    public interface DisplayTable

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  DisplayTable.DisplayTableFromTable 
      static class  DisplayTable.Fallback 
      static class  DisplayTable.IOMode 
      static class  DisplayTable.StandardDisplayTables 
      static class  DisplayTable.UnicodeBrailleDisplayTable 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Charset asCharset()
      Charset to decode Liblouis' representation of dot patterns, which can be the "dotsIO" representation or which can be according to a display table (depending on the mode).
      Character decode(Character c)
      Convert a dot pattern from the representation defined in this table to Unicode braille.
      String decode(String s)
      Convert a braille string from the representation defined in this table to Unicode braille.
      Character encode(Character c)
      Convert a dot pattern from Unicode braille (U+2800 to U+28FF) to the representation defined in this display table.
      String encode(String s)
      Convert a braille string either Unicode braille (U+2800 to U+28FF) to the representation defined in this display table.
      static DisplayTable fromTable(String table) 
      static DisplayTable fromTable(String table, DisplayTable.Fallback virtualDotsFallback) 
      DisplayTable.IOMode getMode()
      Mode value to set in order to be able to use the Charset returned by asCharset().

    • Method Detail

      • asCharset

        Charset asCharset()
        Charset to decode Liblouis' representation of dot patterns, which can be the "dotsIO" representation or which can be according to a display table (depending on the mode).

      • getMode

        DisplayTable.IOMode getMode()
        Mode value to set in order to be able to use the Charset returned by asCharset().

      • encode

        Character encode(Character c)
        Convert a dot pattern from Unicode braille (U+2800 to U+28FF) to the representation defined in this display table.

      • decode

        Character decode(Character c)
        Convert a dot pattern from the representation defined in this table to Unicode braille.

      • encode

        String encode(String s)
        Convert a braille string either Unicode braille (U+2800 to U+28FF) to the representation defined in this display table.
        Returns:
        a String with the same length as s.

      • decode

        String decode(String s)
        Convert a braille string from the representation defined in this table to Unicode braille.
        Returns:
        a Unicode braille string with the same length as s.

      • fromTable

        static DisplayTable fromTable(String table)

      • fromTable

        static DisplayTable fromTable(String table,
                              DisplayTable.Fallback virtualDotsFallback)
